snippet: While American concerns halted one of the requirements for switching control of the Parwan prison, Afghanistan vowed to go on with a ceremony marking its takeover.
abstract: United States halts the transfer of the final Afghan detainees at the Parwan detention facility in Kabul, Afghanistan, a last-minute obstacle to one of the centerpieces of the hand-over of American control to Afghan authority; Afghan government says it plans to proceed with a transfer ceremony to mark the shift in detention operations, even as the United States says the hold is in place because of doubts about the government's commitment to other parts of of a memorandum of understanding agreement.
lead_paragraph: While American concerns halted one of the requirements for switching control of the Parwan prison, Afghanistan vowed to go on with a ceremony marking its takeover.

headline.seo: U.S. Puts Final Afghan Transfers at Parwan Prison on Hold
headline.main: U.S. Puts Transfer of Detainees to Afghans on Hold
headline.print_headline: U.S. Holds Off Transferring Final Detainees to Afghans
